title: GTA Online: Money Fronts
headline: GTA Online: Money Fronts
subtitle: Experience Improvements
content:
In GTA Online: Money Fronts we’ve implemented a number of experience improvements, including adding Missile Lock-On Jammer capability to 50 more vehicles, making several mission cutscenes skippable upon replay, and doubling all sources of Arena Points.

We’re also delaying the global signal timer for Sell Missions in public sessions and disabling the Boxville Van Delivery Vehicle from Biker Sell Missions.
